sentences.en: ...a wind-up gramophone with a big horn.
sentences.cn: ...一台带大喇叭的发条式留声机。
装有发条的老式留声机

sentences.en: And the gramophone needle is not as good as a used toothpick.
sentences.cn: 唱针也不比用过的牙签儿好多少.

sentences.en: Billy: I can't an instrument, sir. I can only play gramophone records.
sentences.cn: 比利: 我什么乐器也不会, 先生. 我只会放唱机.

sentences.en: Eg: The telephone and the gramophone were contemporary inventions.
sentences.cn: 电话和流声机是同一时代的发明.

sentences.en: Go to the gramophone at the foyer and take the record.
sentences.cn: 去休息室查看留声机并取走唱片.

sentences.en: Gramophone records warp in very hot weather.
sentences.cn: 天气太热时,唱片会弯翘.

sentences.en: I bought an electric gramophone last year.
sentences.cn: 我去年买了一台电唱机.

sentences.en: I'm afraid the old gramophone has conked out.
sentences.cn: 恐怕这架旧唱机已出故障了.

sentences.en: Take a rest on gramophone record.
sentences.cn: 连趴著的休息都要趴在我的黑胶唱片上.

sentences.en: The gramophone brayed out its vulgar tune.
sentences.cn: 留声机闹哄哄地唱着庸俗的小调.

sentences.en: The gramophone had been eclipsed by new technology such as the compact disc.
sentences.cn: 激光唱片等新技术使留声机黯然失色。

sentences.en: The telephone and the gramophone were contemporary.
sentences.cn: 电话和留声机是同一时代的产物.

sentences.en: They danced to an ancient gramophone.
sentences.cn: 他们随着一架老式留声机的音乐跳起舞来.

sentences.en: While Fisher fetched the bottle he pulled out the gramophone and put on a record.
sentences.cn: 费希尔去取酒瓶时,他拉出了留声机,放上一张唱片.
